name: zip_files_bot
description: A simple telegram bot that takes a list of files sent by the user and returns them zipped.

bot_token.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

app_id.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

app_hash.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

session_dsn.description: session_dsn is the session name wanted
